steps.title: Stone Cloud
steps.text:
The Stone Box connects the dwelling to the <color=#00D8FF>Stone Cloud</color>, a storage system used for saving and retrieving record sheets from a campaign.


When you place a Settlement Record Sheet or Survivor Record Sheet in a Stone Box, it will communicate with the <color=#00D8FF>Stone Cloud</color> and save its information there. We recommend using this at the end of your gaming session to save your campaign.


Record Sheets can be viewed and printed from a dwellers login area at <color=#00D8FF><link="https://kingdomdeath.com/simulator">kingdomdeath.com/simulator</link></color>


Limit 5 campaigns per Stone Box.
